name: mm-ajax
description: A simple non rendered XMLHttpRequest wrapper api.

attributes.name: contentType
attributes.description: Content type header to send to server

attributes.name: method
attributes.description: http request method to use for XHR call. Note that the component exposes constants for dev usage.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: when auto is true exec() is called whenever the body changes

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: The request body to pass to the server for POST or PUT calls

attributes.name: withCredentials
attributes.description: Passes the withCredentials param to the XHR needed for some secure CORS scenarios.

attributes.name: concurrency
attributes.description: The request concurrency for the execQueue methods

attributes.name: xhr
attributes.description: A reference to the XHR object created for this call if needed

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: Optional body data to be passed with the call if this.body is or when it is desired to override

arguments.name: options
arguments.description: Optional ajax config object that is mixed into the default config to override any default config as desired

methods.name: queue
methods.description: Enqueus the XHR call to be triggered by execQueue. Returns the promise for the call being queued.

arguments.name: data
arguments.description: Optional body data to be passed with the call if this.body is or when it is desired to override

arguments.name: options
arguments.description: Optional ajax config object that is mixed into the default config to override any default config as desired

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: Name to use for the queue. if not is provided the default queue is used.

methods.name: execQueue
methods.description: Executes a given queue of requests. Returns a queue promise which resolves when all calls have completed.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: Name of the queue to execute. if not is provided the default queue is executed.

methods.name: abort
methods.description: Cancels an in progres XHR call.

methods.name: addHeader
methods.description: Adds a header name/value pair to the headers array.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the header eg: X-Requested-By

methods.name: addParam
methods.description: Adds a queryString name/value pair to the query array.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the query param

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The value of the query param

methods.name: addUrlParam
methods.description: Adds a url chunk to the urlParams array. Useful for ids or other dynamic url parts. / is added automatically.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The name of the url chunk to add.

detail.name: percent
detail.description: Decimal percentage of the progress. From 0 to 1.

detail.name: total
detail.description: The total size in bytes of the request.

detail.name: current
detail.description: The current number of bytes loaded.

detail.name: error
detail.description: A message about what has failed

detail.name: instance
detail.description: A reference to the mm-ajax instance that failed

detail.name: response
detail.description: In cases where the response has actually been recieved before the error this will contain the API response if any.

events.disclaimer: This is fired when the data is parsed and available on the response property

detail.name: response
detail.description: The parsed response from the server

detail.name: instance
detail.description: A reference to the mm-ajax component that requested the response
